subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A controversial goal helped Roma to a 1-0 win at Udinese and moved the team within 1 point of the Serie A leader, Juventus, which was held to a 1-1 draw.
snippet: A controversial goal helped Roma to a 1-0 win at Udinese and moved the team within 1 point of the Serie A leader, Juventus, which was held to a 1-1 draw.
